deleteOnTermination.description:
Boolean controlling whether the EBS volumes created to
support each created instance will be deleted once that instance is terminated.

deviceName.description: Path at which the device is exposed to created instances.

encrypted.description: Boolean controlling whether the created EBS volumes will be encrypted. Can't be used with `snapshot_id`.

iops.description:
Number of I/O operations per second the
created volumes will support.

outpostArn.description:
ARN of the Outpost on which the snapshot is stored.

> **Note:** You can specify `encrypted` or `snapshot_id` but not both.

snapshotId.description:
ID of an EBS snapshot that will be used to initialize the created
EBS volumes. If set, the `volume_size` attribute must be at least as large as the referenced
snapshot.

throughput.description: Throughput that the EBS volume supports, in MiB/s. Only valid for `volume_type` of `gp3`.

volumeSize.description:
Size of created volumes in GiB.
If `snapshot_id` is set and `volume_size` is omitted then the volume will have the same size
as the selected snapshot.

volumeType.description: Type of EBS volume to create. Can be `standard`, `gp2`, `gp3`, `io1`, `io2`, `sc1` or `st1` (Default: `standard`).
